title: How to get Among Us customs skins for free in PC - Quora

response.answer_text: You cannot, like not legally. You have to pay for it. And if you want it for free those pets and skins then you may have to hack the game. Only then you can get it for free. And I am telling you this is not a good way. I am just answering your question. You should buy it if you need it! Thank you. I hope I could help you ✨☺️ ❤️🎮
